title: The Inaugural Olympic eSport Series was a ground-breaking event for e-racing
content:
On June 23, Zach Nehr flew to Singapore for the inaugural Olympic eSport Series. Here, he recounts his experience at the ground-breaking event raced on Zwift.

Read the full article at The Inaugural Olympic eSport Series was a ground-breaking event for e-racing on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
